src.app.routes module¶

src.app.routes.index()[source]¶

Redirect root URL to the analysis page.

Returns:

Redirect response to /analysis.

Return type:

werkzeug.wrappers.response.Response

src.app.routes.analysis()[source]¶

Render the analysis dashboard with precomputed metrics.

Queries multiple metrics from the database via query_data and computes percentages for display.

Returns:

Rendered HTML page with data injected.

Return type:

str

src.app.routes.pull_data()[source]¶

Start a background pipeline run to fetch and insert new data.

If a pull is already running, flashes a warning. Otherwise, starts a background thread that calls pipeline.run_pipeline() inside an application context.

Returns:

Redirect back to the analysis page with a flash message.

Return type:

werkzeug.wrappers.response.Response

src.app.routes.update_analysis()[source]¶

Refresh the analysis page once a pipeline run is finished.

If a pull is still running, notifies the user to wait. Otherwise, reloads data from the database.

Returns:

Redirect back to the analysis page with a flash message.

Return type:

werkzeug.wrappers.response.Response

GradCafe Analyzer
